title: ARAM Queue  - Ridiculous wait times
body:
Hello,

I enjoy the ARAM game mode to a point where I created an account to only play it.
Recently I found queue lengths way out of proportion.

My queue approx last night said
1:32

Actual went on to 14:48 - Without even finding a single match (So it is not with declined matches)

I quit the queue and tried again, same story - I tried my main account - Same story?

Why is this happening, is there a fix, is it a known bug, will there be an update if it is a bug?

replies.body:
I queued between 4 and 6pm WST..

On Easter Monday it was during the day at like 11am/12pm..
What time did you queue? from like 3am to 11am you usually get insanely long queues like this.
